00108 void EnterIMPSkillTrait( void )
00109 {
00110 //    UINT32 uiCnt;
00111   VOBJECT_DESC    VObjectDesc;
00112 
00113       //add the skill trait buttons
00114       AddImpSkillTraitButtons();
00115 
00116 
00117       // load the stats graphic and add it
00118       VObjectDesc.fCreateFlags=VOBJECT_CREATE_FROMFILE;
00119       FilenameForBPP("LAPTOP\\SkillTraitSmallGreyIdent.sti", VObjectDesc.ImageFile);
00120       if( !AddVideoObject(&VObjectDesc, &guiIST_GreyGoldBox ) )
00121       {
00122             Assert( 0 );
00123             return;
00124       }
00125 
00126 
00127 
00128   giIMPSkillTraitFinsihButtonImage =  LoadButtonImage( "LAPTOP\\button_5.sti" ,-1,0,-1,1,-1 );
00129   giIMPSkillTraitFinsihButton = CreateIconAndTextButton( giIMPSkillTraitFinsihButtonImage, pImpButtonText[ 24 ], FONT12ARIAL, 
00130                                                                                                  FONT_WHITE, DEFAULT_SHADOW, 
00131                                                                                                  FONT_WHITE, DEFAULT_SHADOW, 
00132                                                                                                  TEXT_CJUSTIFIED, 
00133                                                                                                  LAPTOP_SCREEN_UL_X +  ( 350 ), LAPTOP_SCREEN_WEB_UL_Y + ( 340 ), BUTTON_TOGGLE, MSYS_PRIORITY_HIGH,
00134                                                                                                  BtnGenericMouseMoveButtonCallback, (GUI_CALLBACK)BtnIMPSkillTraitFinishCallback );
00135 
00136 
00137 
00138       SetButtonCursor( giIMPSkillTraitFinsihButton, CURSOR_WWW);
00139 
00140       //if we are not DONE and are just reviewing
00141       if( iCurrentProfileMode != IMP__FINISH )
00142       {
00143             //Have the NONE trait initially selected
00144             gfSkillTraitQuestions[ IMP_SKILL_TRAITS__NONE ] = TRUE;
00145       }
00146 
00147       HandleSkillTraitButtonStates( );
00148 
00149       //reset last selecterd trait
00150       memset( gbLastSelectedTraits, -1, IST__NUM_SELECTABLE_TRAITS );
00151 }

00162 
00163 void ExitIMPSkillTrait( void )
00164 {
00165       INT32 iCnt;
00166 
00167       DeleteVideoObjectFromIndex( guiIST_GreyGoldBox );
00168 
00169       //remove the skill buttons
00170       for(iCnt = 0; iCnt < IMP_SKILL_TRAITS__NUMBER_SKILLS; iCnt++)
00171       {
00172             //if there is a button allocated
00173             if( giIMPSkillTraitAnswerButton[iCnt] != -1 )
00174             {
00175                   RemoveButton(giIMPSkillTraitAnswerButton[ iCnt ] );
00176                   UnloadButtonImage(giIMPSkillTraitAnswerButtonImage[ iCnt ] );
00177             }
00178       }
00179 
00180       RemoveButton( giIMPSkillTraitFinsihButton );
00181       UnloadButtonImage( giIMPSkillTraitFinsihButtonImage );
00182 }
00183 
00184 
00185 void HandleIMPSkillTrait( void )
00186 {
00187       if( gfIST_Redraw )
00188       {
00189             RenderIMPSkillTrait( );
00190             gfIST_Redraw = FALSE;
00191       }
00192 
00193   InvalidateRegion(LAPTOP_SCREEN_UL_X,LAPTOP_SCREEN_WEB_UL_Y,LAPTOP_SCREEN_LR_X,LAPTOP_SCREEN_WEB_LR_Y);
00194 }

00196 void AddImpSkillTraitButtons()
00197 {
00198       INT32 iCnt = 0;
00199       UINT16 usPosX, usPosY;
00200 
00201       usPosX = IMP_SKILL_TRAIT__LEFT_COLUMN_START_X;
00202       usPosY = IMP_SKILL_TRAIT__LEFT_COLUMN_START_Y;
00203 
00204 
00205       for(iCnt = 0; iCnt < IMP_SKILL_TRAITS__NUMBER_SKILLS; iCnt++)
00206       {
00207             //reset
00208             giIMPSkillTraitAnswerButton[iCnt] = -1;
00209 
00210             //if we are not DONE and are just reviewing
00211             if( iCurrentProfileMode != IMP__FINISH )
00212             {
00213                   gfSkillTraitQuestions[ iCnt ] = FALSE;
00214             }
00215 
00216             //if the merc is a FEMALE, skip this skill cause there isnt any fenmal martial artists
00217             if( ShouldTraitBeSkipped( iCnt ) )
00218             {
00219                   usPosY += IMP_SKILL_TRAIT__SPACE_BTN_BUTTONS;
00220 
00221                   //if its the none button
00222                   if( iCnt == IMP_SKILL_TRAITS__NONE-1 )
00223                   {
00224                         usPosX = IMP_SKILL_TRAIT__NONE_BTN_LOC_X;
00225                   }
00226                   continue;
00227             }
00228 
00229             if( iCnt == 0 )
00230                   giIMPSkillTraitAnswerButtonImage[ iCnt ] =  LoadButtonImage( "LAPTOP\\button_6.sti", -1,0,-1,1,-1 );
00231             else
00232                   giIMPSkillTraitAnswerButtonImage[ iCnt ] =  UseLoadedButtonImage( giIMPSkillTraitAnswerButtonImage[ 0 ], -1,0,-1,1,-1 );
00233 
00234             giIMPSkillTraitAnswerButton[iCnt] = QuickCreateButton( giIMPSkillTraitAnswerButtonImage[ iCnt ], usPosX, usPosY,
00235                                                       BUTTON_TOGGLE, MSYS_PRIORITY_HIGHEST - 3,
00236                                                       MSYS_NO_CALLBACK, (GUI_CALLBACK)BtnIMPSkillTraitAnswerCallback);
00237 
00238             //Set the button data
00239             MSYS_SetBtnUserData( giIMPSkillTraitAnswerButton[iCnt], 0, iCnt );
00240             SetButtonCursor( giIMPSkillTraitAnswerButton[iCnt], CURSOR_WWW);
00241 
00242             //Get rid of playing the button sound, it will be handled here
00243             ButtonList[ giIMPSkillTraitAnswerButton[ iCnt ] ]->ubSoundSchemeID = 0;
00244 
00245             //Determine the next x location
00246             if( iCnt < IMP_SKILL_TRAIT__SKILL_TRAIT_TO_START_RIGHT_COL )
00247                   usPosX = IMP_SKILL_TRAIT__LEFT_COLUMN_START_X;
00248             else
00249                   usPosX = IMP_SKILL_TRAIT__RIGHT_COLUMN_START_X;
00250 
00251             //Determine the next Y location
00252             if( iCnt == IMP_SKILL_TRAIT__SKILL_TRAIT_TO_START_RIGHT_COL )
00253                   usPosY = IMP_SKILL_TRAIT__RIGHT_COLUMN_START_Y;
00254             else
00255                   usPosY += IMP_SKILL_TRAIT__SPACE_BTN_BUTTONS;
00256 
00257             //if its the none button
00258             if( iCnt == IMP_SKILL_TRAITS__NONE-1 )
00259             {
00260                   usPosX = IMP_SKILL_TRAIT__NONE_BTN_LOC_X;
00261             }
00262       }
00263 }

00265 
00266 void BtnIMPSkillTraitAnswerCallback(GUI_BUTTON *btn,INT32 reason)
00267 {
00268       // btn callback for IMP personality quiz answer button
00269       if (!(btn->uiFlags & BUTTON_ENABLED))
00270             return;
00271 
00272       if( reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_DWN )
00273       {
00274 //          btn->uiFlags|=(BUTTON_CLICKED_ON);
00275 
00276             INT32 iSkillTrait =  MSYS_GetBtnUserData( btn, 0 );
00277 
00278             HandleIMPSkillTraitAnswers( iSkillTrait, FALSE );
00279       }
00280 }
00281 
00282 void HandleIMPSkillTraitAnswers( UINT32 uiSkillPressed, BOOLEAN fResetAllButtons )
00283 {
00284       UINT32 uiCnt;
00285 
00286       //if we are DONE and are just reviewing
00287       if( iCurrentProfileMode == IMP__FINISH )
00288       {
00289             return;
00290       }
00291 
00292       //if we are to reset all the buttons
00293       if( fResetAllButtons )
00294       {
00295             //loop through all the skill and reset them
00296             for( uiCnt=0; uiCnt<IMP_SKILL_TRAITS__NUMBER_SKILLS; uiCnt++ )
00297             {
00298                   gfSkillTraitQuestions[ uiCnt ] = FALSE;
00299             }
00300             return;
00301       }
00302 
00303       //make sure its a valid skill
00304       if( uiSkillPressed > IMP_SKILL_TRAITS__NUMBER_SKILLS )
00305       {
00306             Assert( 0 );
00307             return;
00308       }
00309 
00310 
00311       //if its allready set
00312       if( gfSkillTraitQuestions[ uiSkillPressed ] )
00313       {
00314             //dont need to do anything
00315             return;
00316       }
00317 
00318       HandleLastSelectedTraits( (INT8)uiSkillPressed );
00319 
00320 /*    
00321       //if there are already 2 skills selected, and we are trying to PRESS a new button ( skill isnt currently set )
00322       if( CountNumSkillStraitsSelected() == 2 && 
00323                   !gfSkillTraitQuestions[ uiSkillPressed ] &&
00324                   uiSkillPressed != IMP_SKILL_TRAITS__NONE )
00325       {
00326             //if we have to, unselect an existing trait
00327 
00328             //play the diosabld sound
00329 //          PlayButtonSound( giIMPSkillTraitAnswerButton[ uiSkillPressed ], BUTTON_SOUND_DISABLED_CLICK );
00330 
00331             //dont select a new one
00332 //          return;
00333       }
00334 */
00335 
00336       //Set the skill
00337 //    gfSkillTraitQuestions[ uiSkillPressed ] = !gfSkillTraitQuestions[ uiSkillPressed ];
00338       gfSkillTraitQuestions[ uiSkillPressed ] = TRUE;
00339 
00340       //if the NONE trait was selected, clear the rest of the buttons
00341       if( uiSkillPressed == IMP_SKILL_TRAITS__NONE )
00342       {
00343             //reset all the traits
00344             HandleIMPSkillTraitAnswers( 0, TRUE );
00345 
00346             gfSkillTraitQuestions[ IMP_SKILL_TRAITS__NONE ] = TRUE;
00347       }
00348 
00349 
00350       //make sure the none skill is NOT selected if we select anything else
00351       if( uiSkillPressed != IMP_SKILL_TRAITS__NONE )
00352       {
00353             gfSkillTraitQuestions[ IMP_SKILL_TRAITS__NONE ] = FALSE;
00354       }
00355 
00356       //Play the button sound
00357       if( gfSkillTraitQuestions[ uiSkillPressed ] )
00358       {
00359             PlayButtonSound( giIMPSkillTraitAnswerButton[ uiSkillPressed ], BUTTON_SOUND_CLICKED_ON );
00360       }
00361       else
00362       {
00363             PlayButtonSound( giIMPSkillTraitAnswerButton[ uiSkillPressed ], BUTTON_SOUND_CLICKED_OFF );
00364       }
00365 
00366       //update buttons
00367       HandleSkillTraitButtonStates( );
00368 
00369       //redraw the screen
00370       gfIST_Redraw = TRUE;
00371 }
00372 
00373 INT8  CountNumSkillStraitsSelected( BOOLEAN fIncludeNoneSkill )
00374 {
00375       UINT32      uiCnt;
00376       INT8  iNumberSkills=0;
00377       UINT32      uiUpperLimit;
00378 
00379       if( fIncludeNoneSkill )
00380       {
00381             uiUpperLimit = IMP_SKILL_TRAITS__NUMBER_SKILLS;
00382       }
00383       else
00384       {
00385             uiUpperLimit = IMP_SKILL_TRAITS__NONE;
00386       }
00387 
00388       for( uiCnt=0; uiCnt < uiUpperLimit; uiCnt++ )
00389       {
00390             //if the skill is selected ( ie depressed )
00391             if( gfSkillTraitQuestions[ uiCnt ] )
00392             {
00393                   iNumberSkills++;
00394             }
00395       }
00396 
00397       return( iNumberSkills );
00398 }
00399 
00400 
00401 void HandleSkillTraitButtonStates( )
00402 {
00403       UINT32 uiCnt;
00404 
00405       for( uiCnt=0; uiCnt<IMP_SKILL_TRAITS__NUMBER_SKILLS; uiCnt++ )
00406       {
00407                   //if the merc is a FEMALE, skip this skill cause there isnt any fenmal martial artists
00408             if( ShouldTraitBeSkipped( uiCnt ) )
00409             {
00410                   continue;
00411             }
00412 
00413             //if the skill is selected ( ie depressed )
00414             if( gfSkillTraitQuestions[ uiCnt ] )
00415             {
00416                   ButtonList[ giIMPSkillTraitAnswerButton[ uiCnt ] ]->uiFlags |= BUTTON_CLICKED_ON;
00417             }
00418             else
00419             {
00420                   ButtonList[ giIMPSkillTraitAnswerButton[ uiCnt ] ]->uiFlags &= ~BUTTON_CLICKED_ON;
00421             }
00422       }
00423 }
00424 
00425 void IMPSkillTraitDisplaySkills()
00426 {
00427       UINT32 uiCnt;
00428       UINT16 usPosX, usPosY;
00429       UINT16 usBoxPosX, usBoxPosY;
00430   HVOBJECT  hImageHandle;
00431 
00432 
00433       //Display the title
00434       DrawTextToScreen( gzIMPSkillTraitsText[ IMP_SKILL_TRAIT__TITLE_TEXT ], IMP_SKILL_TRAIT__TITLE_X, IMP_SKILL_TRAIT__TITLE_Y, IMP_SKILL_TRAIT__TITLE_WIDTH, IMP_SKILL_TRAIT__TITLE_FONT, IMP_SKILL_TRAIT__COLOR, FONT_MCOLOR_BLACK, FALSE, CENTER_JUSTIFIED );
00435 
00436       // Stats
00437       GetVideoObject(&hImageHandle, guiIST_GreyGoldBox );
00438 
00439       usPosX = IMP_SKILL_TRAIT__LEFT_COLUMN_START_X + IMP_SKILL_TRAIT__TEXT_OFFSET_X;
00440       usPosY = IMP_SKILL_TRAIT__LEFT_COLUMN_START_Y + IMP_SKILL_TRAIT__TEXT_OFFSET_Y;
00441 
00442       for( uiCnt=0; uiCnt<IMP_SKILL_TRAITS__NUMBER_SKILLS; uiCnt++ )
00443       {
00444             usBoxPosX = usPosX - IMP_SKILL_TRAIT__GREY_BOX_OFFSET_X;
00445             usBoxPosY = usPosY - IMP_SKILL_TRAIT__GREY_BOX_OFFSET_Y;
00446 
00447             //if the merc is a FEMALE, skip this skill cause there isnt any fenmal martial artists
00448             if( ShouldTraitBeSkipped( uiCnt ) )
00449             {
00450                   //if its the none button
00451                   if( uiCnt == IMP_SKILL_TRAITS__NONE-1 )
00452                   {
00453                         usPosX = IMP_SKILL_TRAIT__NONE_BTN_LOC_X + IMP_SKILL_TRAIT__TEXT_OFFSET_X;
00454                         usPosY += IMP_SKILL_TRAIT__SPACE_BTN_BUTTONS;
00455                   }
00456                   continue;
00457             }
00458 
00459             //if the trait is selected
00460             if( gfSkillTraitQuestions[ uiCnt ] )
00461             {
00462                   //Display the gold background box
00463                   BltVideoObject(FRAME_BUFFER, hImageHandle, 1, usBoxPosX, usBoxPosY, VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY,NULL);
00464             }
00465             else
00466             {
00467                   //Display the grey background box
00468                   BltVideoObject(FRAME_BUFFER, hImageHandle, 0,usBoxPosX, usBoxPosY, VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY,NULL);
00469             }
00470 
00471             //draw the text to the screenx
00472             DrawTextToScreen( gzIMPSkillTraitsText[ uiCnt ], usPosX, usPosY, 0, IMP_SKILL_TRAIT__FONT, IMP_SKILL_TRAIT__COLOR, FONT_MCOLOR_BLACK, FALSE, LEFT_JUSTIFIED );
00473 
00474             //Determine the next x location
00475             if( uiCnt < IMP_SKILL_TRAIT__SKILL_TRAIT_TO_START_RIGHT_COL )
00476                   usPosX = IMP_SKILL_TRAIT__LEFT_COLUMN_START_X + IMP_SKILL_TRAIT__TEXT_OFFSET_X;
00477             else
00478                   usPosX = IMP_SKILL_TRAIT__RIGHT_COLUMN_START_X + IMP_SKILL_TRAIT__TEXT_OFFSET_X;
00479 
00480             //Determine the next Y location
00481             if( uiCnt == IMP_SKILL_TRAIT__SKILL_TRAIT_TO_START_RIGHT_COL )
00482                   usPosY = IMP_SKILL_TRAIT__RIGHT_COLUMN_START_Y + IMP_SKILL_TRAIT__TEXT_OFFSET_Y;
00483             else
00484                   usPosY += IMP_SKILL_TRAIT__SPACE_BTN_BUTTONS;
00485 
00486             //if its the none button
00487             if( uiCnt == IMP_SKILL_TRAITS__NONE-1 )
00488             {
00489                   usPosX = IMP_SKILL_TRAIT__NONE_BTN_LOC_X + IMP_SKILL_TRAIT__TEXT_OFFSET_X;
00490             }
00491       }
00492 }

00494 
00495 void BtnIMPSkillTraitFinishCallback(GUI_BUTTON *btn,INT32 reason)
00496 {
00497       // btn callback for IMP personality quiz answer button
00498       if (!(btn->uiFlags & BUTTON_ENABLED))
00499             return;
00500 
00501       if( reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_DWN )
00502       {
00503             btn->uiFlags|=(BUTTON_CLICKED_ON);
00504 
00505             //if we are just reviewing the page
00506             if( iCurrentProfileMode == IMP__FINISH )
00507             {
00508                   //go back tot he done screen
00509                   iCurrentImpPage = IMP_FINISH;
00510             }
00511             else
00512             {
00513                   iCurrentImpPage = IMP_MAIN_PAGE;
00514 
00515                   if( CameBackToSpecialtiesPageButNotFinished() )
00516                   {
00517                   }
00518                   else
00519                   {
00520                         //We are finished on this page
00521                         iCurrentProfileMode = IMP__ATTRIBUTES;
00522                   }
00523             }
00524       }
00525 }
00526 
00527 
00528 BOOLEAN CameBackToSpecialtiesPageButNotFinished()
00529 {
00530       //if we are in a page that comes after this one
00531       if( iCurrentProfileMode == IMP__ATTRIBUTES )
00532       {
00533             return( TRUE );
00534       }
00535       else
00536       {
00537             return( FALSE );
00538       }
00539 }

00544 
00545 INT8  DoesPlayerHaveExtraAttibutePointsToDistributeBasedOnSkillSelection()
00546 {
00547       INT8        bExtraPoints=10;
00548       INT8        bNumSkills=0;
00549 
00550       //Count the number of skills selected
00551       bNumSkills = CountNumSkillStraitsSelected( FALSE );
00552 
00553       //if there NONE selected
00554       if( bNumSkills == 0 )
00555       {
00556             bExtraPoints = 10;
00557       }
00558 
00559       //if there is 1 trait selected
00560       else if( bNumSkills == 1 )
00561       {
00562             //if the trait is not the ones you cant be expert in )
00563             if( gfSkillTraitQuestions[ IMP_SKILL_TRAITS__ELECTRONICS ] ||
00564                         gfSkillTraitQuestions[ IMP_SKILL_TRAITS__AMBIDEXTROUS  ] ||
00565                         gfSkillTraitQuestions[ IMP_SKILL_TRAITS__CAMO ] )
00566             {
00567                   bExtraPoints = 5;
00568             }
00569             else
00570             {
00571                   bExtraPoints = 0;
00572             }
00573       }
00574 
00575       //else both traits selected
00576       else
00577       {
00578             bExtraPoints = 0;
00579       }
00580 
00581       return( bExtraPoints );
00582 }
00583 
00584 
00585 
00586 BOOLEAN ShouldTraitBeSkipped( UINT32 uiTrait )
00587 {
00588       if( uiTrait == IMP_SKILL_TRAITS__MARTIAL_ARTS && !fCharacterIsMale )
00589             return( TRUE );
00590       else
00591             return( FALSE );
00592 }
00593 
00594 
00595 void AddSelectedSkillsToSkillsList()
00596 {
00597       UINT32      uiCnt;
00598 
00599       //loop through all the buttons and reset them
00600       for( uiCnt=0; uiCnt<IMP_SKILL_TRAITS__NONE; uiCnt++ )
00601       {
00602             //if the trait is selected
00603             if( gfSkillTraitQuestions[ uiCnt ] )
00604             {
00605                   //switch on the trait, and add it to the list
00606                   switch( uiCnt )
00607                   {
00608                         case IMP_SKILL_TRAITS__LOCKPICK:
00609                               AddSkillToSkillList( LOCKPICKING );
00610                               break;
00611 
00612                         case IMP_SKILL_TRAITS__HAND_2_HAND:
00613                               AddSkillToSkillList( HANDTOHAND );
00614                               break;
00615 
00616                         case IMP_SKILL_TRAITS__ELECTRONICS:
00617                               AddSkillToSkillList( ELECTRONICS );
00618                               break;
00619                         
00620                         case IMP_SKILL_TRAITS__NIGHT_OPS:
00621                               AddSkillToSkillList( NIGHTOPS );
00622                               break;
00623

00626                               break;

00634                               break;

00638                               break;
00639

00667 
00668 
00669 void HandleLastSelectedTraits( INT8 bNewTrait )
00670 {
00671       INT8  bTemp=-1;
00672       //if there are none selected
00673       if( gbLastSelectedTraits[ 0 ] == -1 )
00674       {
00675             gbLastSelectedTraits[ 0 ] = bNewTrait;
00676       }
00677 
00678       //if the second one is not selected
00679       else if( gbLastSelectedTraits[ 1 ] == -1 )
00680       {
00681             gbLastSelectedTraits[ 1 ] = gbLastSelectedTraits[ 0 ];
00682             gbLastSelectedTraits[ 0 ] = bNewTrait;
00683       }
00684 
00685       else
00686       {
00687             //unselect old trait
00688             gfSkillTraitQuestions[ gbLastSelectedTraits[ 1 ] ] = FALSE;
00689 
00690             gbLastSelectedTraits[ 1 ] = gbLastSelectedTraits[ 0 ];
00691             gbLastSelectedTraits[ 0 ] = bNewTrait;
00692       }
00693 }
